#[[++

Copyright (C) 2021 Strings developers

All rights reserved.

This file has been generated by the Automatic Component Toolkit (ACT) version 1.7.0-develop.

Abstract: This is an autogenerated CMakeLists file for the development of String example library.

Interface version: 1.0.0


]]

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)

### The implementation of the String example library component
project(StringsExample)

set (CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

# The location of autogenerated interfaces
set(CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Interfaces)

file(GLOB STRINGSEXAMPLE_SRC
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Stub/*.cpp
)
file(GLOB STRINGSEXAMPLE_HDR
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Stub/*.hpp
)
set(STRINGSEXAMPLE_SRC ${STRINGSEXAMPLE_SRC} ${STRINGSEXAMPLE_SRC}
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR}/strexample_interfaceexception.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR}/strexample_interfacewrapper.cpp
)

add_library(stringsexample SHARED ${STRINGSEXAMPLE_SRC})
# Do not prefix the binary's name with "lib" on Unix systems:
set_target_properties(stringsexample PROPERTIES PREFIX "" IMPORT_PREFIX "" )
# The following two properties are crucial to reduce the number of undesirably exported symbols
set_target_properties(stringsexample PROPERTIES CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET hidden)
set_target_properties(stringsexample PROPERTIES VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN ON)
# This makes sure symbols are exported
target_compile_options(stringsexample PRIVATE "-D__STRINGSEXAMPLE_EXPORTS")
target_include_directories(stringsexample PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR})
target_include_directories(stringsexample PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Stub)
